#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#define MOD 1000000007
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
 vector <long long> a(100);
 long long c,t,n,i,f1,f2,ans,n1,n2,temp;
 scanf("%lld\n",&t);
 while(t--)
 {
  scanf("%lld\n",&n);
  n=n*2;
  c=n;
  i=0;
  while(c)
  {
   a[i]=c%2;
   i++;
   c=c/2;
  }
  //printf("%lld\n",i);
  i=i-2;
  f1=0,f2=1;
  while(i>=0)
  {
   n1=f1*f1+f2*f2;
   n1=n1%MOD;
   n2=2*f1*f2+f2*f2;
   n2=n2%MOD;
   f1=n1;
   f2=n2;
   if(a[i]==1)
   {
    f1=f1+f2;
    temp=f1;
    f1=f2;
    f2=temp;
   }
   i--;
  }
  printf("%lld\n",((f1+f2)*f2)%MOD);
 }
 return 0;
}
